name: Escape the void (asbux)
description:
Escape the void is a 2d action rogue like where you fight waves of enemies and bosses and use their green souls to open chests and get powerful items that make you get strong  and maybe just maybe escape the void.

Key features:

  • 5 Playable  characters
  • 10  Weapons
  • 18 Enemies and bosses
  • 80 Items

Controls:

  • Move: w/a/s/d
  • Aim: mouse
  • Shoot: right click
  • Ability: left click
